channel.title: Comments on: SSRS Properties – Description
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Kaushal
item.dc:creator: Kaushal
item.description: This is great. I was always curious as to where this property is in Visual Studio. I looked in The report property dialog box that comes up when right clicking on the report area - > Report Properties. Thanks.
item.content:encoded: This is great. I was always curious as to where this property is in Visual Studio. I looked in The report property dialog box that comes up when right clicking on the report area – > Report Properties. Thanks.

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: That's cool, I didn't know you could do that. I always just created one in Report Manager.
item.content:encoded: That’s cool, I didn’t know you could do that. I always just created one in Report Manager.
